snippet.title: Colored Effects - Trailer
snippet.description:
Colored Effects is a puzzle platformer game where you use different abilities to advance through levels. Each color grants a unique ability. Switch between the colors and their effects to collect gems, defeat bosses, and solve fun puzzles.

➤ Get Colored Effects on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1892570/Colored_Effects/
➤ Get Colored Effects on Nintendo Switch : https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/colored-effects-switch/

➤ Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/dXFYmhFnx4
➤Twitter: https://twitter.com/TacSou
